news.title: Automakers largely sit out 2026 Super Bowl advertising amid industry uncertainty
news.summary: Automakers are largely sitting on the advertising sidelines during this year's Super Bowl. The Super Bowl comes amid broader uncertainty in the U.S. automotive industry.

news.title: Hims & Hers pulls copycat weight-loss pill after threats of legal action
news.summary: Hims & Hers announced it would stop offering its copycat of the weight-loss pill Wegovy after threats of legal action.

news.title: Japanese Prime Minister Takaichi's ruling LDP seen winning outright majority in snap election: NHK
news.summary: PM Takaichi's Liberal Democratic Party is likely to win between 274-328 seats in the Lower House. That's higher than the 233 seats needed for a majority, NHK says.

news.title: Trump administration equity stakes pose risks to U.S. companies and markets
news.summary: The Trump administration's growing portfolio of direct investments is unprecedented outside an economic crisis or wartime. The Trump administration is making investments in a range of industries, including real estate, technology, and agriculture.

news.title: Pressure mounts on American Airlines CEO as carrier lags rivals
news.summary: American Airlines made $111 million last year. Delta Air Lines and United Airlines, brought in $5 billion and $3.3 billion, respectively.

news.title: ‘I’m not made of money’: My heating engineer didn’t fix my radiators on his first visit. Do I pay him a second time?
news.summary: "He charged $180 for the second visit for his time, including $40 for the part," the victim's attorney says. "It was a lot of money," the attorney adds. "He's a good guy. He's not a bad person"

news.title: ‘I love being debt-free’: I’m in my mid-50s and buying a house. Do I take out a $400K mortgage or use my Roth IRA?
news.summary: “I’ll fund $500,000 of that from the sale of my current house,” he says. “I will fund $1 million of that through my personal savings.”

news.title: After bitcoin’s fall, pity those wildly enthusiastic investors who borrowed billions against crypto
news.summary: The speculation that bitcoin would hit $200,000 in 2025 now seems like a dream. Because it was. The speculation that Bitcoin would hit £1,200 in 2025 is now a dream, too.

news.title: ‘Guests tell me I have dust bunnies’: My $150-an-hour cleaner has become increasingly negligent. Do I fire her?
news.summary: ”I like her as a friend, but I’m underwhelmed as a client.” “I’ve never been so disappointed in a client in my life,” she said.

news.title: There is a severe doctor shortage. How to find a good one.
news.summary: What can you do if your doctor retires or quits? What do you do when your doctor quits or retires? Share your story with CNN iReport.
